channel.title: Docs on Joo-Von Kim
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Joo-Von Kim

item.title: CV
item.description:
Positions #

  • Associate Editor (Oct 2023 – )
    npj Spintronics
    Nature Publishing Group

  • CNRS Research Director (Oct 2021 – )
    Centre de Nanosciences et de Nanotechnologies, Palaiseau, France

  • CNRS Research Fellow (Oct 2004 – Sep 2021)
    Centre de Nanosciences et de Nanotechnologies, Palaiseau, France (from 1 Jun 2016)
    Institut d’Electronique Fondamentale, Orsay, France

  • Postdoctoral Fellow (Oct 2002 – Sep 2024)
    Institut d’Electronique Fondamentale, Orsay, France

  • Doctoral Fellow (Feb 1999 – Sep 2022)
    Department of Physics, University of Western Australia, Crawley, Australia
